listing.listing_description: The approach to Mer Soleil sets the stage for an exotic French Creole villa with Mediterranean flair. Colorful mosaics embedded in whitewash walls hug the teak main gate further flanked by tall palms in oversized planters. Past the gate, the stone paved drive is edged with colorful tropical shrubs and palms. Arches, terracotta roofing, columns and ironwork define the entrance. The view dazzles as you enter the home. The turquoise pool edged by tropical foliage draws your eye to the Caribbean Sea and brilliant blue sky. Within view are the island of Saba, Baie Lounge Beach and the luxury hotel La Samanna. At night, sunsets are simply brilliant.The villa flows seamlessly from the interiors to the covered terraces and onto the spacious pool terrace. The open plan great room mixes Caribbean touches with French style. Arched windows, doors and ironwork add to the exotic attitude. Rattan, teak, painted and tiled furniture accent the local art and interesting accessories. Cream and blue tones connect the seating and dining area. A large Provençal style kitchen, in beautiful wood cabinetry and marble tiles with high-end appliances, is a very elegant place to prepare a meal, whether by a professional or amateur chef. The main kitchen opens to the view and to a gorgeous blue tile Moroccan inspired covered outdoor kitchen and dining gazebo. It is a stunning place to cook and dine al-fresco. The gazebo also houses additional living room seating overlooking the gardens and ocean view.Three bedrooms are in the main villa; two off the upper terrace and one at garden level. Two additional bedrooms are in a private cottage tucked behind the villa. All bedrooms have either sea or garden views plus private seating inside and out. Poster beds, rattan and teak furniture, charming Provence and tropical inspired fabrics in blues, yellows and white create a romantic feel to the rooms. The en-suite bathrooms are gorgeous in traditional Provençal tiles and mosaics, each room in a different color. Several bathrooms have either sea or garden views from their walk-in showers. The cottage bedroom suites each have a wet bar and fridge while also providing an interconnecting door, a great feature for families.You are close to amenities. Wonderful gourmet food and wine stores are just a short drive in Cupecoy. A short 15-minute drive and you are at the International airport or the nightlife of Maho. The French Capital, Marigot, is only 15 minutes from the villa where you can enjoy Duty Free shopping, boutiques, bakeries and the Creole Market.

listing.listing_description: Meet the Caribbean beach of your dreams at Villa Bari. One of three nearly identical luxury vacation rentals on Taylor Bay Beach, this beautiful one-bedroom home is only steps from the sugary white sand lined with palm trees and calm, turquoise waters that Turks and Caicos is known for. Book the villa by itself for an incredible honeymoon, or all three for an intimate destination wedding or family reunion.Start the day by taking in the stunning ocean views over breakfast at the table on the villa’s private terrace, then stretch out on a lounger or have a swim in the pool. Take a snorkel and flippers out to the beach and explore the bay, or practice your serve on the shared tennis court. As the shadows get longer, heat up the barbecue and enjoy an al-fresco dinner.This oceanfront villa’s cool, contemporary interiors echo the colors of the beach outside. In the open-plan great room, tile floors throughout the sitting area and fully equipped kitchen match the sand, while a turquoise sofa, blue glass pendant lights and vibrant artwork bring in the hues of the water. Relax in front of the TV or sip coffee at the breakfast bar for two.Of course, it’s also tempting to linger in the bedroom at Villa Bari, with its king bed, en-suite bathroom and furnished balcony overlooking the ocean. Slide open the wide glass doors and fall asleep to the sound of the waves, or flip on the ceiling fan and drift off in its gentle breeze.Most visitors choose Turks and Caicos for a holiday on some of the world’s top-ranked beaches, and Villa Bari puts you close to a quiet, pristine stretch of sand. If you can’t get enough of the picturesque bays, make the short drive from the villa to legendary Grace Bay Beach or Long Bay Beach. It’s also an easy trip to the nearest golf course, the gorgeous Princess Alexandra National Park, Turtle Cove Marina and downtown Providenciales.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Celebrate a special anniversary, family reunion or destination wedding at Milestone. There’s no better place to revel in a landmark occasion than this Turks and Caicos vacation rental, with its backdrop of white sand and turquoise ocean and stunning Grace Bay location. Watch the sun play on the water from the oceanfront terrace or listen to the waves from the newly renovated interiors and four suite-style bedrooms.Milestone makes it easy to enjoy the balmy weather with a resort-worthy heated pool, beachfront lounge area and bar, a barbecue and firepit and al-fresco dining for eight. The adventurous can explore on the provided bicycles; everyone else can claim a sunbed or take a stroll on the powdery sand. A housekeeper and butler will keep you comfortable during your holiday.Bright, open interiors make a sophisticated setting in which to enjoy the luxury of everyone’s company. Window seats in the living and dining rooms are charming additions to the seating on the sectional and table for ten, and accents like nautical objets and underwater photography are playful, beachy touches. The large, fully equipped kitchen has both style and substance, with a practical island layout and a breakfast bar stocked with chic Louis Ghost stools.All four bedrooms at Milestone have en-suite bathrooms, making each a private haven. There are two suites with king beds and ocean views that open to the terrace, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each.Rated one of the best beach destinations in the world for its soft sands and clear, warm waters, Turks and Caicos is popular with everyone from honeymooners to families to golf-happy retirees. Milestone sits on Grace Bay, one of the top-ranked beaches, close to the market, marina, golf, and shopping and dining along the row of resorts. Don’t miss nearby Princess Alexandra National Park, a marine preserve with incredible snorkeling, wind sports and postcard-perfect views.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located along the coast of San Jose Del Cabo, with a spectacular ocean view that overlooks Rosarito Beach, La Terraza is the perfect home base for your next amazing Luxury Retreats vacation. Four en-suite bedrooms and proximity to golf, nightlife, shopping, and gorgeous beachfront, make La Terraza ideal for a private family vacation, a golf trip with friends, and any other occasion worth celebrating in style. And, with the One and Only Palmilla resort right next to the villa, you won’t have far to go to find some of the Cabo’s finest attractions.Showcasing Spanish colonial architecture, La Terraza makes elegant use of natural wood, stone, and clay to create the ideal open-air beach atmosphere. Inside, high ceilings and large openings to the terrace invite ocean breeze to flow freely through the spacious living room. Decorated with colonial art, high-end electronics, and designer furniture, La Terraza is tropical-chic and ready for any occasion.La Terraza’s ocean view terrace is the perfect place to enjoy a lazy afternoon lounging in the pool or soaking in the hot tub. At dinner, the alfresco set and fire pit makes a great setting for a barbecue with the family.If there’s a golfer in your group, they are in luck. Within ten kilometers you’ll have access to El Dorado Golf and Beach Club, and Palmilla Golf Club, designed by PGA legend Jack Nicklaus. You’ll also have plenty of opportunities to work on your tan at many nearby beaches, the closest being Rosarito and the private Palmilla Beach Club. Travel a little further, and you’ll find the absolutely gorgeous, and usually a little less populated, Costa Azul and Tequila Cover beaches. And for some Mexican city life, San Jose Del Cabo is a relaxed beach town with plenty of historical sites, art galleries, and fine dining establishments, or, you could head south to Cabo San Lucas for vibrant beach nightlife, international restaurants, and exciting adventure tourism.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Treat yourself to a lazy stay away from it all at Calista Boutique Beachfront Villa. Coconut palms sway overhead and the Pacific laps at the sandy shore just steps from this four-bedroom Costa Rica vacation rental. Despite its secluded setting—and lack of televisions—this tropical idyll is just a short drive from the beach town of Santa Teresa.Soak in the sun from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, hammocks, loungers and a barbecue or simply walk the few steps down to the beach. After watching the sun set over the ocean, share snaps of your holiday via Wi-Fi or just listen to the waves lapping at the shore; there’s purposely no television to give you the luxury of unplugging.Not only is the villa’s main living area open concept, it’s open sided, too. A simple palapa-style roof stretches over the sitting area, a dining area for ten and a fully equipped kitchen, leaving the space open to views of the waves and the warm tropical breezes. Furnishings made from locally sourced wood add to the sense that the surroundings are part of the residence.There are two bedrooms in the main house at Calista Boutique Beachfront Villa, each with a king bed, twin bed and en-suite bathroom with an al-fresco shower. There are also two honeymoon-suite-style guest houses, each with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, kitchenette, dining area and, perhaps best of all, beach access. Together, the bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight friends or family.From the villa’s private oceanfront setting, it’s only a short drive to two other beaches, where you can while away an afternoon or try surfing on a popular local break. A nearby grocery store makes it easy to re-stock, and for dining and nightlife, the nearest town is only 5 minutes away by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further detailsThe perfect home base for your large group’s Caribbean getaway, One Perfect Day is one of St. Thomas’ most impressive luxury villas, with nine en-suite bedrooms, accommodations for twenty-six, and instant beachfront access to Magen’s Bay. With a lengthy list of amenities, this spacious vacation home is an amazing setting for a beachfront wedding, family reunion, or high-end corporate retreat. Within minutes of Magen’s Bay, you’ll find golf, natural and historical wonders, plenty more beautiful beachfront, and the vibrant city of Charlotte Amalie.Under One Perfect Day’s peaked ceilings, you’ll find designer furniture, state of the art electronics, dynamic ocean views, and an airy, open concept layout that makes group gatherings a breeze. The villa comes with a fully equipped kitchen, wine fridge, an outdoor wet bar, barbecues, and formal and alfresco dining options. And, the integrated sound system, billiard/ping pong table, exercise and massage rooms, and televisions will provide entertainment inside.On the terrace and beachfront, paradise awaits. With multiple living, dining, and lounging areas, you’ll have plenty of space to gather as one or break off from the group for more intimate occasions. The infinity pool and calm waters of Magen’s Bay are beautiful places to beat the heat. And, during your stay, you’ll have daily maid service, a concierge, and the use of three clear kayaks.One Perfect Day comes with two Family Suites that feature king-sized beds and two twin bunk beds, as well as lounge areas and en-suite bathrooms. There are seven more king bedrooms, all with en-suites. And, the Master Bedroom enjoys a private balcony, walk-in closet, alfresco shower, and an amazing ocean view.St. Thomas is a relatively small island, so visiting sites like Drake’s Seat, Blackbeard’s Castle, and Tombstone Rock can all easily be enjoyed in an afternoon. If you’re in the mood to dine out, do some duty-free shopping, or dance the night away, visit Charlotte Amalie, the island’s capital, just ten minutes from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy a vista worthy of royalty at King’s View. Set on its own private stretch of sand just minutes from Harbour Island’s famous Pink Sand Beach, this beautiful vacation rental looks out over the turquoise waters of the bay on the island’s south end. Reserve this eight-bedroom luxury property for a relaxed holiday with extended family, or a fishing or snorkeling getaway with friends.The villa has everything you’d expect from a beachfront resort, from a heated infinity pool, 25-meter lap pool and steps down to the sand to al-fresco lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and an outdoor kitchen. Inside, you’ll find more five-star amenities such as ping-pong and pool tables, an exercise room and, for entertainment, a sound system and Wi-Fi.Inspired by the traditional architecture of the Bahamas, this newly built residence has plenty of charm. Swinging daybeds, a turtle pond and lanterns from New Orleans set a gracious tone in the entry courtyard that continues inside with shiplap walls and pecky cypress ceilings. An open-plan great room is a natural gathering place, with its pair of tufted leather sofas, dining table for eight, and fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.Each of the eight bedrooms at King’s View has an en-suite bathroom, and several have separate entrances, making them perfect for the couple still on honeymoon or in-laws seeking privacy. There are six bedrooms with king beds, including one master suite with an al-fresco shower and one bedroom with its own kitchenette, one bedroom with two twin beds, and one children’s room with two twin bunk beds.While King’s View feels like your own oceanfront retreat, it’s not far from dining and shopping at the popular Aquapazza Wine Bar and Restaurant or in Dunmore Town. Stroll barefoot on your own private beach or make the short walk to Pink Sand Beach, or let the nearby water taxi take you around Harbour Island and Eleuthera.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: See what wish fulfillment really looks like at Gouverneur Dream. This exquisitely modern St. Barts vacation rental feels like it has its own private views over the white sand and turquoise water of Gouverneur Beach. It’s no less stunning on the inside, with rooms that use the island’s rock as part of the architecture and plenty of playful artwork.Your holiday at this dreamy luxury property begins with a meet and greet, an escort to the villa and a welcome gift. Let the days unfurl as you lounge by the heated infinity pool, sip cocktails in the outdoor living area or heat up the gas barbecue for a dinner of fresh local seafood. For active guests, there’s an exercise room; for everyone else, there’s a wine fridge, TV and Wi-Fi.Two open-concept living areas—one on the pool level and one on the upper floor—give you plenty of space to catch up on reading or catch up with friends and family. Downstairs, you’ll find sitting and dining areas plus a wet bar; upstairs, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a dining area open to an al-fresco sitting area.Each of the three bedrooms at Gouverneur Dream has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, Apple TV and air conditioning. One of the bedrooms opens to its own terrace, and another has a spa-worthy al-fresco shower. Traditional furnishings and neutral tones in the bedrooms are set off by oversized artwork with cheeky themes.The villa is a short drive from several of the island’s most popular beaches, including St. Jean Bay, Nikki Beach and Anse des Cayes Beach, where you can take a honeymoon-style stroll along the sand or join the jet set at waterfront clubs. Have dinner or do some shopping in the charming capital, Gustavia, or take a boat ride to the pristine scenery of Saint Barthelemy Nature Reserve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A fusion of Mexican and modern architecture, this elegant beachfront villa features not only stunning design, but is also steps away from the golden sand and azure surf of Los Cabos famous East Cape. Situated in the exclusive new development of Puerto Los Cabos, Casa Piedra Blanca takes your vacation retreat to another level.The mexican Hacienda style converges in a beautiful terrace surrounded by exotic vegetation witExperience three miles of pristine coastline, a world-class marina and Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman signature golf courses during your stay at Casa Piedra Blanca. Step into the exclusive world of Puerto Los Cabos, a 2000-acre destination resort where modern comforts and amenities meet age-old traditions for gracious living. Right on the sea, at Casa Piedra Blanca you will be perfectly poised for a fabulous vacation in the sun.The grounds at Casa Piedra Blanca include a pristine, heated infinity swimming pool. You can also relax in the outdoor hot tub and allow the soothing bubbles to massage your cares away. You’ll also find ample deck space on which to lounge around and a fire pit—perfect for stargazing at night. Alfresco dining is such a delight on the large table on the covered terrace. The interiors of Casa Piedra Blanca feature purified water, satellite television, Blu-ray/DVD players, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and ceiling fans. Your reservation includes security and housekeeping.A fusion of classic Mexican and modern architecture, this elegant beachfront villa features not only stunning design, but is also steps away from the golden sand and azure surf of Los Cabos’ famous East Cape. Vaulted ceilings and bright interiors lend an airy and breezy atmosphere to this stunning villa. The traditional hacienda style converges in a beautiful terrace surrounded by exotic vegetation. You will enjoy a little break from the sun in the open plan living and dining areas. The fully equipped kitchen includes a center island and a breakfast bar.Five magnificent bedrooms accommodate up to ten guests at Casa Piedra Blanca. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms. Four of the suites offer televisions, DVD players and direct access to the terrace. Fall sound asleep with nothing but the sound of waves as your soundtrack.Come to Cabo expecting to toss your inhibitions to the wind? Where else do clubs round up conga lines so that waiters can pour tequila down dancers’ throats? Those moments of absurdity and abandon notwithstanding, Cabo San Lucas has a curious charm and is also perfect for families. The beaches are protected by beautiful Land’s End, and the activities are endless: jet-skiing, banana boating, parasailing, snorkeling, kite surfing, diving and horseback riding opportunities can all be explored by just walking down to the beach. Paradise awaits!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located just steps from Mexico’s beloved oceanfront promenade, The Malecon, Punta Del Cielo is right in the heart of this astonishing coastal community. With gorgeous beach and oceanfront on one side and the bustling bars, restaurants, and nightlife of Puerto Vallarta’s downtown core on the other, The Malecon is the place to be. Nearby by, you’ll find several world-class beaches, golf courses, and exciting tourist excursions. And, with six luxurious bedrooms, this villa is perfect for a large family vacation, a social getaway with a group of friends, or a sun-kissed corporate retreat.There won’t be any fighting over “the good bedroom” at Punta Del Cielo. Each one is lavishly decorated with a king-sized bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, and an amazing ocean view. In fact, nearly every inch of this hillside home has a spectacular ocean view. With plenty of openings to the multi-leveled terrace, most interior spaces flow seamlessly outside to more functional, furnished areas. The vibe of this vacation villa is all about elegant relaxation and the enjoyment of Mexico’s natural features. Lush greenery, eclectic artwork, high-end electronics, and designer furniture decorate each unique area, creating a relaxing, yet functional home for your next Luxury Retreats getaway.Inside, Punta Del Cielo comes with a fully equipped kitchen, formal dining for twelve, Wi-Fi, and satellite television. On the terrace, there’s a refreshing infinity pool, Alfresco dining, and plenty of sun loungers, just sit back and enjoy the ocean view.The quickest and easiest way to see what’s going on in Puerto Vallarta is to walk The Malecon; you’ll probably spend a lot of time there. After you’ve done that, venture on to some of Mexico’s most famous beaches, like Camarones, Olas Atlas, and Los Muertos, all within two-kilometers. If you’ve got a golf aficionado in the group, Vista Vallarta and El Tigre Golf Clubs are close by, both feature carefully designed holes, as challenging as they are scenic.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Clémentine villa is located on the hillside of Vitet, overlooking Lorient Bay while offering a wide view towards Saint Martin. The island of Saint Barts has earned its reputation for being luxurious and exclusive. The beaches are secluded, the water is warm and the landscape is composed of beautiful hills and ravines. With a distinct French influence, the island is sophisticated, yet laid back. The people of St. Barts take great pride in providing comfort, quiet and security to their visitors. Enjoy this escape with Luxury Retreats!The grounds of this stunning vacation rental feature a swimming pool flanked by padded sun loungers and palm trees swaying in the wind. Climb the stairs to the covered alfresco dining area and lounge. There’s also a second outdoor lounge with a hanging chair and a sun bed. Inside this private holiday home, you will find a Nespresso machine, ice maker, Wi-Fi, desk and satellite television. There’s also an exercise room to stay on top of your workouts. Your reservation includes housekeeping.The contemporary interiors of Clémentine showcase high ceilings, stylish furnishings and exquisite lighting fixtures. The white and bright open plan space includes a sleek set of couches and a large flat screen television. Behind it, the fully equipped kitchen offers a center island with a long breakfast bar. Two bedrooms include high vaulted ceilings, adding a quintessentially Caribbean motif.In total, three bedrooms with queen size beds and en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to six guests at this non-smoking villa. Each bedroom provides a dual vanity, dressing area, lounge, ceiling fan and direct access to terrace and spectacular ocean views. We recommend this villa for a family reunion, a couples’ getaway or a special event like a wedding, birthday or anniversary.Stone fences crisscross the steep slopes of Morne du Vitet, one of many mountains on St. Barts, along a rocky shore that resembles the rugged coast of Normandy. There is plenty of opportunity for fun and adventure, from volleyball to tennis and water skiing. In Gustavia, St. Barts’ tiny and relaxed capital city, you will discover red roofed buildings that pop through the lush tropical landscape, and all the historical sites can be seen over the course of a leisurely day. There is a little something for everyone on the tropical paradise of Saint Barts!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sol e Luna is a very pretty, French Creole style villa that blends Caribbean charm with a contemporary attitude. Past the new gate, a long drive lined with lovely palms and tropical plants delivers you to the inviting entrance. The beautiful view captures your eye the moment you step inside. It is a stunning vista filled with the lush green mountains that roll along the spine of St Martin and the deep blue of Simpsons Bay Lagoon and the endless blue sky. The spacious terraces provide a multitude of peaceful spots to simply sit and watch the sunrise and the sunset while cooled by gentle breezes.Wonderful, deep covered loggias filled with ample seating, both for private interludes and group gatherings, fill the terrace. A huge outdoor dining table under a large gazebo makes you feel as if you are dining al-fresco at the edge of a tropical jungle paradise. The view is stunning. The large pool sits center stage on the terrace. Newly enlarge and refurbished, it is a wonderful place to do laps, cool off or just lounge with a cool drink.The interiors open wide to the outdoors; large glass doors disappear seamlessly into the walls creating a lovely flow out to pool and terrace. The open plan great room has a contemporary attitude filled with comfortable seating for both dining and lounging. Clean lines, soft neutral tone and pops of hot color compliment the dark wood furniture and the well-chosen accessories. A newly remodeled, modern gourmet kitchen is sleek and elegant, yet quite well equipped. It opens to the view.The three bedrooms are equal size and all under one roof, all just off the great room. Each one has a beautiful view and private seating on the terrace. The décor is filled with beautiful fabrics and linens in white and soft neutrals, creating a serene place to relax. All have pretty spa style en-suite bathrooms with walk-in showers and tumbled marble, river pebbles and white cabinetry. One has a large Moroccan style outdoor shower and one has a sea view.You are close to amenities. Five minutes to Cupecoy for grocery shopping and fine and casual dining and another 10 minutes to our International airport SXM and Maho's restaurants and casinos. A short 15-minute drive and you are at the International airport or the nightlife of Maho. The French Capital, Marigot, is only 15 minutes from the villa where you can enjoy Duty Free shopping, boutiques, bakeries and the Creole Market.

listing.listing_description: There are times at CieloMar, between the rambling words of your favorite author or the quiet meditations of your mind, when you will not be sure if you are aboard a ship or on a bride, walking on a dock or on a deck. With the Pacific Ocean to the west and an Arnold Palmer golf course to the east, the site design focuses every view towards the sea. The vantage point of a promontory three hundred feet above sea level has created opportunities for dramatic architecture and structural finesse.At the end of the bridge, you feel as if soaring above the jungle and ocean. The bridge points to where the sun dips below the horizon each evening, making it the best spot for cocktail hour! Organizing the levels downward into the face of the cliff also presented the opportunity to cantilever the infinity swimming pool over the edge of the terrace, creating the illusion of swimming three hundred feet above the sea. The Olympic-sized pool is lined with charcoal-black volcanic lava stone, imparting a deep blue color to the water.The ‘bow and arrow’ design of the house affords complete privacy. Air conditioned interior spaces open to the ocean views, as well as a large exterior covered loggia that functions as an outdoor living room to enjoy Costa Rica’s famous warm and mild weather while being protected from the equatorial sun. The super-panoramic vistas throughout the building have been achieved by curving the house in a semicircle around a radial point in front of the bridge.Six stellar bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests with two staff members. A unique feature of the master suite is a completely private, sunken Zen garden with an outdoor shower. Fine linens and accoutrements provide splendid nights of rest.Have a cruise around with the bicycles or head out to the links! The villa also offers a variety of watersports equipment for your use. During your stay at CieloMar, you will be just a five minute buggy ride to restaurants, shops, tennis and the spa. Beyond its unparalleled design, the perks at CieloMar include a home theater, a gym, a wet bar and two private studies. Ping pong and board games are also provided. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Floor-to-ceiling, corner-to-corner windows align with the rows of beach chairs below this corner suite in South Beach. A white Eames lounger parked in front of the glass sets the tone for this residence: cool, collected, and modern. Go downstairs for a tea-inspired spa treatment and Asian flavors under a retractable roof at the Setai’s spa and restaurant, and walk to white-sand Miami Beach. Start holiday mornings with a cup from the Nespresso machine or a fresh-squeezed Florida orange juice on the private balcony. A cable TV and Wi-Fi keep you connected, while central air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable. Guests of this vacation rental are welcome at the hotel’s pools, hot tubs, fitness center, and on the beach area. Glass lines the great room for ocean views from the living area, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen. The sofa and lounger are tucked into the corner for the best beach vistas, while a round marble dining table encourages catching up with friends and family. Honey-colored cabinets in the kitchen echo the warm tones of the Eames lounger across the room, giving the space a considered feel. This luxury property has two bedrooms: a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed, jetted tub, and desk area, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. Both bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. The Setai’s beachfront setting means you’re a 5-minute walk or less from a nap in a cabana on Miami Beach, the first hole of the Miami Beach Golf Club, and the camera-ready architecture and restaurants around Collins Park. Spend the day getting inspired by the public art—and tempted by the world-class boutiques—in the Miami Design District, then catch a basketball game or concert in the evening at American Airlines Arena. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Overlooking Cove Lagoon and just two minutes away from the pristine two half mile white sand beaches of Maundays and Cove Bay, Mystique at Sheriva is one of Anguilla’s top luxury boutique villas. Located in the chic West End, the villa is situated on a lush 10-acre alcove with stunning views of the Caribbean Sea and St. Martin. The property offers ultimate privacy, yet swift access to the island’s finest beaches, boutiques and restaurants.This expansive villa offers three swimming pools, a hot tub and an alfresco shower. The elegant spaces offer tech-savvy comforts such as plasma televisions, DVD players, poolside Bose surround sound and Wi-Fi so that your stay can be as relaxing or as festive as you desire. Fire up the barbeque and enjoy some outdoor dining as you overlook the tropical landscape. A complimentary golf cart helps you zip around the grounds. You can also stay on top of your workouts in the exercise room. Your reservation includes housekeeping, night security and a variety of perks.Nestled behind an artfully designed wall, this boutique villa represents the discerning traveler’s choice for luxury escape. With two bridges leading into the main floor living areas and expansive travertine decks, Mystique at Sheriva is the perfect choice for moonlit dinner parties or intimate wedding receptions. Contemporary and opulent furnishings anoint every corner of this villa – ambience is key.The master bedrooms, fittingly called the Grand Villa Suites, are plush retreats with double showers, signature infinity-edge bathtubs, generous dressing closets and sitting nooks with daybeds for enjoying afternoon tea or simply relaxing before a sunset massage. The Loft Junior Suite sits atop the villa with a private balcony, kitchenette and direct access to the rooftop terrace. The six bedrooms at Mystique at Sheriva accommodate up to fourteen guests.Service at Mystique at Sheriva is paramount. At your request, be spoiled by your private villa chef’s sumptuous creations and ask the concierge to arrange anything you desire, from rejuvenating spa treatments to shopping excursions in St. Barth’s. The villa is perfect for family get-togethers and corporate retreats. Additional rate-inclusive services include a welcome wine basket, afternoon canapés, complimentary shuttle service to Maundays Bay beach, beach chairs and umbrellas as well as signing privileges at Cap Juluca’s three world class restaurants – Pimms, Blu and Spice. Come experience the best of paradise in sunny Anguilla!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Soft sand, warm water and just enough room for the two of you—what could be more romantic than a getaway to Villa Capril? Tucked into a crescent of beach on Sapodilla Bay and beautifully appointed with Carrara marble, the one-bedroom villa is like your own resort. Thanks to a location just minutes from the airport, you’ll have your toes in the sand before you know it.Villa Capril has everything you need to take full advantage of its spectacular location, from lounge chairs and paddleboards to kayaks. Spend the day sunbathing on the terrace next to your private pool, then cook up local seafood on the barbecue and watch the waves as you enjoy a meal at the al-fresco dining area. Set the mood with an iPad and Bluetooth speaker, and stay connected and comfortable with Wi-Fi and air conditioning.Inside, the villa is simple yet luxurious, covered in a generous amount of soft white Carrara marble. Even one wall of the living room is enlivened by the texture of marble, with a turquoise ikat-print chair playing off the pattern of the stone. The fully equipped kitchen is all sleek stainless steel, espresso-toned cabinets and waterfall countertops, and a breakfast bar with just two stools makes each meal an intimate occasion.The bedroom suite at Villa Capril occupies the entire second story, stretching out under a Balinese-style peaked wood ceiling. The king bed faces a pair of wall-to-wall sliding glass doors that open to a balcony overlooking the beach. Set on its own marble platform, a stand-alone bathtub invites you to stay and soak awhile.From the villa’s beachfront setting on Sapodilla Bay, it’s 9.7 km to the dining and nightlife at Turtle Cove, 10.4 km to the courts at Turks and Caicos Islands Tennis Club and 15.3 km to the natural wonders of Princess Alexandra National Park. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 7.5 km trip to Providenciales International Airport.Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Positano is a stunning, single-bedroom luxury villa overlooking Sapodilla Bay on the southern shore of Providenciales. The beachfront home offers an enchanting setting for a honeymoon or romantic escape to Turks and Caicos, with superb living areas, a private pool, and an ample master suite with expansive views of the bay and Caribbean Sea. The villa is within easy reach of Providenciales International Airport, allowing for easy arrival on your honeymoon or romantic escape.Enjoy dreamy days and evenings on the villa's terrace, dipping into the pool and savoring the sunlight on elegant lounge chairs. A stepping-stone path leads from the patio to the white sands, and there's an outdoor shower for a quick rinse after a plunge. Take the kayak or paddleboard out onto the turquoise expanse or swim in the crystalline water, and return in the afternoon to alfresco meals from the barbeque. Bluetooth speakers invite you to play your favorite tunes as you cuddle up under the sunset sky.The villa's interiors are made of luminous Carrera marble, accentuating the exquisite island light. A comfortable lounge faces a TV and wide vistas, with glass doors opening to the pool terrace. The kitchen is fully equipped with high-grade, stainless steel appliances and a breakfast bar. Air conditioning and ceiling fans maintain a cool ambiance at all times.The master suite (occupying the second story of the villa) offers an open-concept layout beneath peaked, Balinese ceilings of rich natural wood. A glass wall frames vistas of the beach and bay, with sliding doors opening to a furnished balcony. An ample tub is perched on a marble platform behind the sumptuous king-size bed, inviting you to leisurely baths in the ocean breeze.Beyond your beachfront sanctuary, you're an easy drive from the nightlife of Turtle Cove, as well as the pristine natural beauty of Princess Alexandra National Park. Turks and Caicos Tennis Club is just over six miles (ten kilometers) from your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Contemporary architecture goes to the beach at Villa Bella Vita. You’ll love gazing upon endless ocean views from Bella Vita’s many luxurious lounge areas. For a closer look, step off the end of the pool deck, and you’ll be on your own private beachfront. Back inside, you and up to fifteen more guests will enjoy and appreciate Bella Vita’s nine king bedrooms, and spacious open concept layout. About a minute’s walk East, you’ll find one of the World’s most gorgeous stretches of sand, Sunset Beach. Also, less than ten miles from home, you’ll be able to enjoy the shops, restaurants, and nightlife of Grace Bay.Bella Vita is the perfect home base for your large group. With two-kitchens, an exercise room, games room, spacious lounge areas, and a basketball court, this villa spares no expense when it comes to entertainment. Nor does it spare any expense on designer furniture, high-end electronics, or eclectic decor. And, with wide openings to the terrace and an open-air layout, Bella Vita’s ocean view and beachfront atmosphere are felt and seen throughout the entire interior.Upon arrival, you’ll be met at the airport by Bella Vita’s staff and transported to and from the villa. You’ll also have use of a Jeep during your stay. You and your guests will love spending afternoons in the ocean, and Bella Vita comes equipped with water sports equipment, an infinity pool, outdoor living/dining areas, and an outdoor kitchen with barbecue to make your time in the sun even more fun.Within 24 km of Bella Vita’s beachfront estate, you’ll be able to find everything you need on your Turks and Caicos getaway. There are markets and grocery stores nearby in the Leeward Settlement with the freshest seafood imaginable. If you’re feeling sporty, The Turks and Caicos Islands Tennis Club and Provo Golf Club are both a short drive from home. To enjoy some local nature and wildlife spend an afternoon at Princess Alexandra National Park. Also, you’ll find wine and tiki bars, and restaurants around the corner at Turtle Cove.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further detailsParadisso is an elegant three storey villa situated in South Hills on the exclusive Cap Estate. The villa fuses classic Mediterranean and Caribbean design to create a uniquely stunning home, built to high standard and finished with quality modern furnishings and appliances. You’ll spend hours scanning the panoramic view stretching from the Atlantic to the Caribbean Sea.When you arrive at the villa, a charming outdoor lounge set under a white pergola will stop you in your tracks. It only gets better. The sun drenched back deck wraps a gorgeous infinity pool whose edge seem to plunge into lush gardens of hibiscus and bougainvillea below. Off the pool another pergola houses a teak deck with chaise longues. An al fresco dining area also offers a great excuse to light the outdoor grill and sizzle up fresh local seafood.The ground floor houses the kitchen, dining area and living room in an airy, open-concept room that allows Atlantic breezes to flow freely. The granite countertops and top-of-the-line appliances make the kitchen an ideal place to cook up a delicious feast. Join your guests for an aperitif on the attached veranda while stars and lights twinkle beyond.Three of Paradisso’s four bedrooms are found on the upper floor, opening onto a cozy living room and entertainment system. The fourth room is on the lower ground floor and opens directly onto the pool deck. The Master bedroom has a King size bed with en-suite bathroom including a walk-in shower and jetted tub. Every other room houses a Queen size bed and en-suite bathroom with shower. All rooms feature air conditioning.Villa Paradisso puts you minutes away from a wealth of adventure. The island’s best golf course is your neighbor and there are several sandy beaches nearby. You’re only 4 miles out of Gros Islet, where you’ll find upscale shops, fine dining and a marina where you can rent a sailboat or organize excursions to Pitons or Sulphur Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Pease Bay House is an exquisite, beachfront villa with some of the most spectacular ocean views on Grand Cayman. With five bedrooms that sleep twelve, and elegant spaces for indoor and outdoor relaxation, it gives elegant privacy to families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests amid the precious natural beauty of this Caribbean paradise. Accommodations for twelve and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort.Nestled amid lush island flora, the villa features an ocean-view terrace with infinite swimming pool touching the white sands of your secluded beach. Relish long days relaxing on poolside loungers or swaying in the hammock within the beachside cabana. Enjoy a game of tennis on the villa's private court, then refresh your body and mind in the turquoise sea. In the afternoon, savor cocktails in the comfortable, covered lounge, before gathering around the alfresco dining table for a delicious meal.From the pool terrace, lovely glass doors open into the villa's interior, where the exquisite décor—including gorgeous furnishings and original artwork—creates an ambience of refined elegance. The ocean-view living room is the perfect setting for evenings with family and friends, while the stunning dining room invites you to epic, nighttime feasts under dazzling chandeliers. The luminous, fully equipped kitchen includes a large breakfast bar and table—an ideal space for savoring bright mornings together.As you make your way to bed, the upstairs landing greets you with another lounge with office desk. The villa's five bedrooms include three with king beds, one with queen, and one with two twin beds—perfect for kids. The spacious master bedroom includes its own lounge and a private, furnished balcony with beautiful ocean views, as well as an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub; while the other king and queen bedrooms also include ensuite bathrooms and terrace or balcony access. Additionally, there is a double-size pullout couch in the media room, with an ensuite bathroom.The Lighthouse Restaurant on the South Coast is just a five-minute drive away, while the Botanical Gardens are just ten minutes by car. The town of Savannah is about ten minutes away, and includes Countryside Shopping Plaza for all necessities._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This sprawling home is located on two acres of land beautifully manicured with lush tropical gardens, easily making it one of our top villas in Barbados. With four bedrooms, it also works perfectly for getaways with families or groups of friends traveling together. The island of Barbados offers visitors a unique tropical holiday thanks to its perfect climate, stretches of amazing beaches and its unique culture.In the center of the villas landscaped grounds you’ll find a large swimming pool surrounded by comfy lounge chairs and a manicured lawn. There are two gazebos nestled in the tropical gardens; one features a small table perfect for an afternoon tea, while the other boasts a comfy lounge chair and ocean views. Under the cover of the terrace, just steps up from the pool, is a large dining table and seating area with tasteful patio furnishings. The villa also boasts a full-sized tennis court, a small fitness room, as well as a staff that includes a butler, two housekeepers and a chef.The interior of this recently renovated home blends opulent furnishings and antiques with European and Caribbean artwork and decor creating a luxurious ambiance. The main salon, which leads out to the terrace, includes a seating area and a small circular table. For a night in, craft an island-inspired meal in the fully equipped kitchen, and dine on the formal Rococo-style dining room with a marble table and access to the gardens.The estate’s four air-conditioned bedrooms extend the same attention to detail found throughout the villa with hand-painted furnishings, carefully selected artwork and fine-quality linens. Up to eight guests are welcome to stay, and each suite offers a private en-suite bathroom.Spend time on the beach nearby, where you can enjoy snorkeling or just relaxing on the sand. For the avid golfer, the Royal Westmoreland golf course is a 5 km drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this villa can be rented with: Leamington Cottage (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/caribbean/barbados/speightstown/leamington-cottage-113956)

listing.listing_description: Follow the wood-deck down to your own slice of Grace Bay Beach at this Bohemian-beach house in Turks and Caicos. Celebrate your honeymoon in a minimalistic setting, only decorated with high-end furnishings and original works of art. Spend your afternoons lounging by the pool or splashing around in the sea. Later, walk over to Turtle Cove Marina and have dinner at one of their seafront restaurants.Authentic beach houses are increasingly becoming a thing of the past, being replaced by larger, character-less villas and condos. Beach Shack stays true to the original style, embracing the natural elements that you traveled for, not the gadgets you can find anywhere. That said, Beach Shack’s simple ingredients are of the highest quality. The walls are Balinese pearl stone. The ceiling is an exotic teak. And the floors are white coral. Outside, the ocean-front pergola is the perfect place to sip wine with that special someone. Then, sit for a moonlit dinner at the alfresco set on the terrace.After spending a few days soaking up the solitude of Beach Shack’s private stretch of sand, visit the west-side of Grace Bay Beach for a tour of the area on horseback. While you’re there, consider a snorkeling or scuba diving lesson. The Crystal clear waters of the Caribbean are perfect for first-timers. Boat tours and fishing charters are also available at the marina, as well as private yacht rentals.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Countless islands dot the turquoise waters in front of this newly built villa on the shores of Chalk Sound. Intricately veined marble and an undulating wood ceiling reflect the shapes of the waves, while polished stone floors reflect the Caribbean sunshine. Take the kayaks out to spot fish in the sound and drive to equally picture-perfect Sapodilla Bay or Taylor Bay for some white-sand beach time. You’ll have to decide if the ocean views are best enjoyed from the swimming pool, the row of loungers by the pool, or the al-fresco dining area on the deck of this Turks and Caicos vacation rental. (There’s also a second outdoor dining table.) Pour a glass from the wine fridge to sip as you grill local seafood on the barbecue, and finish the day in front of the smart TV, Sonos sound system, or Wi-Fi. A wall of fold-away glass is all that separates the oceanfront deck from the villa’s great room, giving you the luxury of opening up one seamless indoor-outdoor living space. Cool stone floors link a sitting area with a sleek white sectional, a dining table for 10, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a dramatic marble backsplash. Alainn Villa has 2 bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with ocean views and direct access to the pool. The other 2 bedrooms are ideal for a family traveling with younger children, with queen beds and a Jack and Jill bathroom that’s accessible from both rooms. Explore by land and by sea using the villa’s provided bicycles and kayaks. By car, it’s a 6-minute drive to some of the best beaches on Providenciales, including Sapodilla Bay Beach and Taylor Bay Beach. If you’re hungry from all the swimming, paddling, cycling, or relaxing you’ve done on holiday, it’s also a short drive to island-favorite restaurants like Las Brisas and Bugaloo’s. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: White sand, turquoise water and your very own villa to enjoy them from—it doesn’t get more idyllic than Casa Edwards Too. This beautifully designed Los Cabos vacation rental is as well appointed as a resort, but has the charm and convenience of a private home. Its oceanfront location in the exclusive Punta Bella gated community in The Corridor is not only steps from the beach, but between the hubs of San José del Cabo and Cabo San Lucas.Outdoor living areas featuring an infinity pool, plenty of loungers in the sun, a barbecue and dining area, and a palapa-covered bar make it easy to relax or entertain from sunrise to gorgeous sunset over the Pacific. Once the sun has finally set, linger outside around the firepit and listen to the waves, or share the best photos of the day via the home’s Wi-Fi.Inside, the Spanish Colonial–style villa captures an easy, breezy luxury. Ocean-inspired tones of blue, green, beige and white create a serene ambience, while open-concept living spaces flow into one another. The living room, dining room and kitchen run the width of the house, so each has ocean views and opens to a deck above the pool terrace.With five bedrooms—four in the main house and one in a guest house—Casa Edwards Too is suitable for a holiday with extended family or a beach getaway with friends. In the main house, there are three bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own terrace, and one bedroom with two queen beds. The guest house bedroom has a queen bed and could be used as separate accommodations for in-laws. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and the main-house rooms have ocean views as well.Casa Edwards Too is located on a quiet, sandy beach that’s both postcard-pretty and ideal for sunbathing, swimming or sunset strolls. The villa is a 5-minute drive from the Palmilla Golf Club, and close to the shopping, dining and entertainment of San José del Cabo. Make the drive into Cabo San Lucas for a day at the beach or a night out in its clubs and breweries.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A gorgeous white-sand beach, charming eco-friendly atmosphere and personalized service await you at Hacienda Chekul. Modeled on traditional buildings, the four-bedroom villa offers gracious, luxurious accommodations in a beautiful beachfront setting near Tulum. Located in the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve, the property is respectful of its surroundings and uses sustainable solar and wind power.The villa’s traditional hacienda architecture extends to its outdoor living spaces, where you’ll find living and dining rooms under an arched veranda. Just beyond, there’s a sunny deck with lounge chairs and a hammock on the path to the beach. A rooftop terrace and pool provide ample opportunities for sunbathing, and an outdoor shower is convenient after a day at the beach. The villa is equipped with Sky TV, Wi-Fi Bluetooth speakers, and the services of a cook, butler, housekeeper and villa manager are included in your stay.Arched doorways, beamed ceilings and bright tilework add charm and cheer to the interiors of Hacienda Chekul. The open, airy living and dining room feature neutral-toned sofas and cane-backed chairs, set off by a patterned floor, turquoise throw pillows and a wrought-iron chandelier. The fully equipped kitchen is warm and welcoming, with yellow walls, rich wood cabinets and a well-loved farmhouse-style table used as a center island.Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and TV, and opens to the terrace. Three of the bedrooms have king beds, and the fourth has two double beds. Sleep soundly in beautiful four-poster or suspended beds in rooms adorned with tall windows and doors, tiled floors and bright, tropical hues of coral and azure.Start or end each day with a stroll on Boca Paila Beach, just steps from the villa, and make time during your stay to explore the surrounding Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. You’ll find dining and nightlife in Tulum, 14 miles away, and another stretch of sand to explore at Papaya Playa Beach, 10 miles away. Make your connection at Cancun International Airport, 87 miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Created to capture golden sunsets, this luxurious six-bedroom vacation rental sits oceanside in Anguilla’s ultra-chic West End. Situated on one-acre of expertly manicured tropical gardens, Kandara enjoys a high-level of privacy, even though many of Anguilla’s most coveted attractions are within a few minutes drive. All six of the villa’s bedrooms come with lavish en-suite bathrooms and direct access to a private balcony or the terrace. And, less than one minute from home, you’ll find a set of steps leading to a secluded swimming cove.With a pure-white aesthetic, Kandara acts like a canvas for warm wood accents, ocean-inspired turquoise, and the vibrant greens of Anguilla. The main floor’s open-concept floorplan allows barrier-free access to the terrace, making it easy for fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to fill the interior spaces, as well as encouraging a free-flowing social atmosphere. Inside and out, you’ll appreciate only top of the line appliances, furnishings, and electronics.Kandara is the perfect host for an exciting social event with its fourteen-seat formal dining area, two alfresco sets, and multiple indoor and outdoor lounge areas. The swimming pool and hot tub are relaxing places to watch the sunset, or if you’d prefer to enjoy it from inside, you’ll appreciate the floor-to-ceiling openings, integrated sound system, and air conditioning.Navigating Anguilla and its neighboring islands is quite easy, and you won’t ever have to travel too far from home to enjoy its pristine beaches, excellent golf course, and vibrant nightlife. West End and Barnes Bay beaches are both located within a few minutes drive from Kandara. If you’d like to check out some of the beachfront on the other islands, head for Blowing Point Ferry Terminal to arrange an exciting day trip. For any golfers in the group, the Cuisinart Golf Course is a scenic and challenging eighteen hole. And, for nightlife, shopping, and restaurants, head to the island’s capital, The Valley.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.This extraordinary beachfront villa is located within the Beach Enclave community on the southeast shore of Providenciales Island. Situated directly on Long Bay Beach, the home features fabulous outdoor living and dining areas with panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea, as well as superbly appointed interiors with high-end audiovisual features and a gourmet kitchen. Your vacation rental includes an impressive array of services and guest perks both in-house and within Beach Enclave. Four king bedroom suites (plus a media room with pull-out sofa) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to ten in size.The Beach Enclave villas are designed by SWA Architects and Domino Creative Interior Designers, with an emphasis on natural materials, sustainability, and harmony with the precious beauty of Turks and Caicos. The villa's ample terrace is perched within steps of the turquoise water, inviting you to sun-kissed days and dreamy evenings in the Caribbean breeze. Dip into the infinity swimming pool and relax on lovely lounge chairs beneath parasols. Descend to the beach’s soft sands and plunge into the luminous waves. Fire up the barbeque in the afternoon and relish an alfresco meal amid breathtaking vistas.Pockets doors form a wall-to-wall threshold between the terrace and interior, inviting a delicious alfresco ambiance indoors. The luminous, open-concept space features a dining table for ten, comfortable sofas with ocean views, and a fully equipped kitchen with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar. Fresh white walls accentuate the exquisite wood accents and touches of sea-inspired artwork and décor.The master bedroom includes a wide vanishing wall opening to a private furnished balcony with panoramic views. Its king bed is accompanied by a private sitting area and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, walk-in shower, and soaking tub. The primary guest suite also enjoys a private, ocean-view balcony and deluxe ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. The other two guest suites include king beds and ensuite bathrooms with showers. There is a safe in each room and air conditioning throughout the villa.The villa is within five kilometers of Provo Golf Club and Grace Bay Beach, and eight kilometers from Princess Alexandra National Park. Providenciales International Airport is less than fifteen kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched above the sugar-white sands of Long Bay Beach, this incredibly scenic five bedroom captures endless views of turquoise sea surrounding the Caribbean island of Anguilla. Each of Sea Villa’s bedrooms comes outfitted with a king-sized bed, lavish en-suite bathroom, and an amazing ocean view. Just steps down from Sea Villa’s gorgeous terrace, you’ll enjoy a quick walk through lush Caribbean greenery, leading to the secluded shores of Long Bay Beach. Nearby, you’ll find restaruants, luxury resorts, scenic golf courses, and plenty more incredible beachfront areas along the coast of Anguilla.White-washed walls act as a canvas for the bright blues and greens of Anguilla’s beautiful environment, which is further accentuated indoors thanks to the wide openings that stretch along the ocean-facing walls. Stately furniture decorates Sea Villa’s open concept interior, adding a touch of elegance to the soothing Caribbean atmosphere. Outside, you’ll love cooling off in the swimming pool, dining alfresco, and rejuvenating in the hot tub. At dinner, there’s formal dining space inside for ten, a fully equipped kitchen, and there’s a gas barbeque on the terrace as well.Sea Villa comes with shared access to the Beach Bar Clubhouse, tennis courts, beach barbeques, and an exersice room. The property is located within a gated community with twenty-four-hour security, daily breakfast, housekeeping, and a butler service. Indoor features include Wi-Fi, Smart television, air conditioning, a Sonos sound system, and a washer/dryer.After you’ve spent a day or two soaking up the sun and surf of Long Bay Beach, venture on to discover some of Anguilla’s other popular beachfront areas, just a few kilometers away on the shores of Sandy Ground and Shoal Bay. To visit with some of Anguilla’s neighboring islands, head to Blowing Point Ferry. If there’s a golf aficianado in the group, CuisinArt Golf Resort is the best course on the island. And, as a reward, check-in to their refreshing spa facility. Anything else you may need can be found nearby in The Valley, including plenty of dining, shopping, and nightlife options.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in an exclusive development of only 15 units surrounded by colorful tropical gardens, Sandy Cove 402 is one of the finest penthouses on the West Coast of Barbados. The parish of St. James is renown for its sparkling white sands and calm turquoise bars. With outstanding panoramas of the Caribbean Sea and access to a secluded beach, this stunning oceanfront vacation rental offers guests a luxurious haven to relax and unwind in this idyllic setting!Sandy Cove 402 showcases a large open sundeck surrounded by golden palms, bougainvillea and desert roses. The sundeck also features a private swimming pool and outdoor shower. You will also find an alfresco dining set and sun beds. Inside, a well appointed office is equipped with a printer and Wi-Fi. The unit also has a temperature controlled wine cellar on the lower level. Guests of this residence also have access to the communal free-form swimming pool, exercise room, sauna and beach facilities of the complex.Sandy Cove 402 has been appointed to the highest standard and its tasteful decor and furnishings will appeal to discerning guests. Decorated in a modern, yet colonial style, the elegant lounge with a piano opens onto a large balcony, an ideal place for sipping cocktails and watching the cruise ships sail away into the sunset. The large, fully equipped kitchen opens onto the elegant dining room which is located on another large balcony offering stunning views of the ocean. The formal dining area with sea view makes a great place to share a special announcement with your friends and family.Four exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, dual vanities, ceiling fans and televisions accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. The master bedroom also features a bidet and a lounge. Three suites also provide balconies at this impressive holiday home.Sandy Cove 402 is located next to the world renowned Cliff Restaurant and only a short distance from Sandy Lane Hotel. Also within easy driving distance are the shops and restaurants of Holetown, the Mount Gay Rum Distillery and the Royal Westmoreland Golf Course. A little further away lies the island’s capital, Bridgetown, whose various historical sites give a feeling of what life must have been like in a bygone era. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats in Barbados!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience a Carribean dream in one of the three delightful, linked homes of this verdant hillside property. Overlooking sapphire-blue Smuggler’s Cove, guests will love the coral-tiled terrace, ideal for pool parties, barbecues and wet-bar fun. Offering premium comfort and sea-view serenity, it’s an ideal home base after a day of swimming, diving or enjoying the beach bars of Tortola’s West End.Cohoba House is a great choice for groups that are looking for privacy for individual families, couples or groups, while sharing a great communal space. Throw open the shutters of the three villas to take in the breathtaking scenery, as the blue seascape below collides with brilliant golden sands. With the property featuring sheltered but airy alfresco dining areas, private balconies, welcoming wood-lined bedrooms and deck doors that just ask to be thrown open, guests can relax and embrace the sea breeze and Carribean sunshine in the best of surroundings. Acting as a secluded enclave on the hillside, guests can be assured of privacy and a peaceful atmosphere.Being located at the western tip of Tortola, guests can choose from a wealth of day-trip and nighttime options. The proximity of Smuggler’s Cove ensures that guests of all ages can experience one of the British Virgin Island’s finest beaches, sheltered on three sides by green hillsides and overlaid by swaying palm trees. Other options include taking a refreshing day cruise by yacht into the great blue yonder, a heart-racing power boat outing, or engaging in a fascinating day dive into the blue world offshore, where schools of tropical fish, coral reefs and rays await. After unwinding with a tropical drink in one of the relaxed local bars, return to the villa’s private balcony or expansive terrace for rest, relaxation and conversation as the sun dips into the sea to the west.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set amongst lush tropical gardens alongside one of Sandy Lane’s three highly coveted golf courses, Klairan is the perfect villa for a secluded family getaway or a golf trip with friends. You’ll have quick and easy access to Sandy Lane Beach, one of the World’s most exclusive beachfront areas, which is just five minutes from home. Klairan’s four en-suite bedrooms, spacious interiors, and beautiful outdoor areas make it an unforgettable setting on your next Luxury Retreats vacation in Barbados.Stately and elegant, villa Klairan wears its colonial heritage on its sleeve. From the decking on the terrace to the peaks of the exposed-ceilings, everything is white-washed, creating the perfect contrast for ocean-inspired splashes of turquoise and the vibrant tropical gardens that surround the villa. An open-air floorplan ensures to the free-flow of guests, sea breeze, and natural sunlight, moving in and out barrier-free. Spaces like the gazebo, koi pond, and swimming pool feel as just as comfortable as the living room and kitchen thanks to the open-plan design and private atmosphere.Klairan comes with formal and alfresco dining settings, as well as a fully equipped kitchen and a barbecue on the terrace. All four bedrooms have air conditioning and en-suite bathrooms. And, you’ll surely appreciate Wi-Fi, cable television, an office space, and helpful staff during your stay.With Sandy Lane Beach just five minutes from home, you won’t have to go far to enjoy a day on one of the most beautiful beaches on the island. However, if you feel like exploring, you’ll find Paynes Bay, Colony Club, Batts Rock, and several more sandy beaches, all under ten kilometers from Klairan. For a night out, Holetown is home to a vibrant bar, restaurant, and dance club scene, with plenty of great places to check out on First and Second streets. And, if it’s golf you’re after, Sandy Lane’s Old Nine course is a classic, and Country Club and Green Monkey have both won numerous awards for their creator, PGA Legend Tom Fazio.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A hand-painted sign hangs over a table on Villa Saline Reef’s immense terrace that reads, “Relax! It doesn’t get much better than this!” Truer words have never been written: luxury, quiet seclusion, tasteful design and spectacular views guarantee this epithet. Located at the northernmost tip of Saline Point in the exclusive Cap Estate, prepare for an escape that will stay with you forever.Bright bougainvillea and lush green tropical flora pepper a large tiled terrace where you’ll find chaises in both sunny and shady spots. Wherever you choose to relax, the gorgeous split-level pool, with waterfall feature, will eventually beckon you. Swim in the lower half or sit in the upper half and enjoy views of Pigeon Island and across the Caribbean straights to Martinique. The dining and grill deck provides an uninterrupted sunset view to enjoy while savoring an al fresco feast.Saline Reef is decorated throughout with soft and handmade furnishings imported from England. The central living room is bright and airy, courtesy of wide French doors, large bay windows and fans hanging from the high, vaulted ceiling. Upstair, a professionally-appointed kitchen gives you everything you need to prepare a memorable meal for your guests. Enjoy it from the elegant dining table that seats 6.The villa sleeps 6 people in 3 bedrooms, including 2 Master bedrooms, one above the other. Each Master bedroom has a private deck, including a romantic crow’s nest seating area for 2, overlooking the sea. All rooms contain a Queen size bed, walk-in closet, fine linens and bathrobes, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.Saline Reef is only 3.8 km from the Rodney Bay area, the hub of St. Lucia’s cultural life. In the town of Gros Islet you’ll find upscale shopping, fine dining and a bustling marina where you can rent sailboats. You’re walking distance from an 18-hole golf course and several beaches ideal for swimming or snorkeling. Boat trips can be arranged to the famous Pitons and Sulphur Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

listing.listing_description: Set within the Sea Horse Ranch, this Caribbean villa offers a private, ocean view, ensuring that you'll have an unforgettable retreat in the Dominican Republic. Villa Casamare’s lush property is decorated with vibrant lawns, tropical plants, mature trees, and a relaxing terrace that is specifically positioned to capture incredible sunsets. Just a short walk from home, you’ll find the sandy shores of the resort’s private beach, and their oceanfront swimming pools.Villa Casamare’s wraparound terrace enjoys access to the pool and lawn area under its pavilion-style covering. Moving inside, wall-length openings follow the contours of the terrace to seamlessly merging the terrace and living room, as well as inviting fresh ocean breeze and warm natural sunlight to fill Casamare’s interior spaces. In the living room, you’ll find designer furnishings, deep wood tones, and ocean-inspired turqouise accents. The fully equipped kitchen is outfitted with high-end applainces, a breakfast bar, and formal dining space with seating for six. After dinner, mix yourself a cocktail at the wet bar and head outside to enjoy another amazing Caribbean sunset.Outside on the terrace, you’ll love cooling off in the swimming pool and enjoying alfresco meals with the scenic ocean view providing a one-of-a-kind background. If you’d rather hang out inside, curl up in the theatre room for a quiet movie night with the family, or catch the big game with friends on the living room’s Smart TV. When it’s time for bed, the master bedroom features a king bed, a walk-in closet, an ocean view, and a lavish en-suite bathroom with dual vanity and two standalone rain showers.Sea Horse Ranch enjoys its own private beach, tennis and equestrian facilities, and an oceanfront restaraunt and swimming pool. If you’re in the mood to explore Sea Horse’s neighboring towns, you’ll find shopping, dining, and nightlife options seven-kilometers away in downtown Sosua, and even more in Puerto Plata.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Laid back tropical comfort meets exquisite taste at Villa Guappa. The design and architecture of this stunning vacation rental offers an idyllic ambience on an exclusive oceanfront/golf-front location in a picturesque setting of the Dominican Republic. Awake to the sound of the sea, the year round breeze and the songs of mockingbirds. Get the holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!The perks at Villa Guappa have been set to overdrive. Enjoy a refreshing dip in the private swimming pool with a built-in hot tub. The grounds have been decked out for the consummate entertainer with an Argentinian-style grill, alfresco wet bar and an outdoor sound system. With a palapa, sun loungers and heat lamps, the terrace awaits both day and night. Inside, you will find cable television, a sound system, another wet bar and complimentary Wi-Fi. Your reservation includes housekeeping, security, chef and laundry services as well as access to the Residents’ Beach Club.The open plan interiors with high ceilings at Villa Guappa are bright and airy. In the living area, the padded rattan furniture and thatched ceilings create a quintessential Caribbean ambience. You will also find a formal dining area for fourteen as well as a professional and spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances. This enchanting villa makes a great bed for weddings and special celebrations.For those serene and lazy vacation nights, seven luxury suites accommodate up to fourteen guests, including children of all ages. One master bedroom includes a king size bed and breathtaking ocean and golf views. Three bedrooms offer a pair of double beds each, as well as views of the tropical gardens. Each bedroom is air conditioned and includes an en-suite bathroom. You will find a variety of sleeping arrangements for everyone in the family.Known for its stunning beaches, let the lapping ocean waves and the rhythms of merengue sweep you away in Punta Cana. This easy going island culture welcomes you to experience its riches to the fullest. Take a walk on the wild side and enjoy cave exploring, zip lining, whale watching and catamaran rides. Swim with dolphins and sea lions, or catch a speedboat over to Isla Saona with a stop at a sand bar for a quick swim in starfish-filled waters. However you choose to explore, start your vacation at Villa Guappa for the ultimate Caribbean experience!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With an unmatched level of privacy, luxury, and convenience, Finisterre offers a truly sumptuous enclave for your St. John vacation. “Finisterre” comes from the Latin phrase “finis terrae,” meaning “end of the earth,” and upon your arrival at this sprawling home, the inspiration for this moniker becomes immediately apparent. Nestled above the shoreline on Bovocoap Point, Finisterre affords sweeping, unobstructed views of the brilliant blues of Hart Bay and Rendezvous Bay beyond, with the wild, windswept Ram Head point in the distance. This, combined with the two-acre compound’s utmost level of privacy, lends a feeling of seclusion and indeed of being at the end of the earth.Each of the six bedrooms at this completely refreshed 1950s bohemian traditional Caribbean-style home has been given its own Latin name, inspired by the features that make Finisterre so special. The rooms Cassiopeia and Andromeda are a nod to the expansive, glittering night sky that stretches above this private estate, while the poolside bedroom, Cetus—meaning whale—pays homage to the gentle giants that migrate through Virgin Islands waters in the winter, when you can witness them breaching from Finisterre’s plethora of outdoor spaces.The large pool features a submerged tanning ledge, ideal for splashing with your littlest loved ones or for reclining under the warm Caribbean sun. A variety of seating areas, both covered and uncovered, border the pool, meaning your entire party can gather in the comfort of the tranquil tradewinds that waft peacefully through Finisterre’s outdoor spaces. The home’s pod-style layout ensures that afternoon siestas or moments of solitude can be enjoyed in the utmost of privacy.A media room, gym, and game room with pool table offer more than enough to keep you and your traveling companions busy, but should you wish to strike out and explore the island’s natural beauty, Finisterre is just a 15-minute drive to St. John’s unspoiled north shore beaches. The shopping, bars, and restaurants in bustling Cruz Bay are less than 10 minutes away by car.For a true escape with a blend of exclusive comfort and enjoyment that you won’t find anywhere else on St. John, come vacation at the end of the earth—Finisterre.

listing.listing_description: Built with the perfect view in mind, this luxury villa’s simplistic, yet highly functional modern architecture merges indoor and outdoor spaces to keep focus towards the ocean. Looking out over Anse a Corossol, which is minutes away, you’ll be nearby several world famous beaches, luxury boutiques, fine dining, and the vibrant night life of St. Bart’s capital city.Dining in is a great option too. With a fully equipped kitchen and breakfast bar, formal dining for eight, and plenty of indoor/outdoor seating, Sasha is a great spot for entertaining guests. The ocean view, barbeque, and infinity pool make the balcony a happening place to be, whether you’re dining alfresco with friends or relaxing in solitude on a sun lounger.Sasha is beautifully laid out, with sharp clean sight lines and modern wood furnishings to contrast the cutting edge open space design, all of which lend to its subtle sophistication. All of the shared indoor spaces at Sasha flow seamlessly into each other and with doors the entire length of the first floor, the balcony, pool and view of the ocean become an equal part of the whole equation.The three bedrooms at Sasha are absolutely top of the line. Each room has an ocean view, access to the terrace, an ensuite bathroom with a rain shower, queen size bed, and satellite television. The master bedroom also has a walk-in closet, dual vanities, and floor to ceiling windows. The other rooms both feature their own private terraces.St. Bart’s is steeped in historical sites, monuments, museums, and so much more. The architecture is like no place else on earth due to the unique mixing of the French, British, Swedish, and Spanish regimes that once colonized this now French territory. So head for Corossol - you’ll have the perfect Caribbean vacation at Villa Sasha.
