listing.listing_description: Relax on your own stretch of world-famous beach at Sunsara. Set on the white sands and turquoise waters of Grace Bay Beach in the exclusive community of Leeward, the recently remodeled four-bedroom villa is a private hideaway in a gorgeous location. It’s the perfect place to get away from it all, but shopping, dining, golf and tennis are just a short drive away, too.Sunsara opens to a terrace with sitting and dining areas and a large freshwater pool surrounded by chaise longues and a hammock. A stroll across the lush lawn brings you to a waterfront deck and a 100-foot stretch of beach. Stay safe in the water with the provided flotation devices, rinse off after a swim in the outdoor shower, have a game on the lawn with the croquet set, prep local seafood on the barbecue and enjoy cocktails in the air-conditioned bar area with iPod sync. For the evenings, the villa has indoor and outdoor televisions, a sound system, board games, Wi-Fi access and air conditioning.The interiors of Sunsara are contemporary and neutral, with ocean-inspired shades of sandy beige upholstery, turquoise accents and dark wood furniture in the open-plan living and dining areas. Floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors mean the living spaces can be opened to the outdoors. The fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar, minimalist flat-front cabinets and sleek stainless steel appliances.Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom with shower and tub, air conditioning, a sitting area and blackout blinds for a restful sleep. The master bedroom has a king bed, ceiling fans, walk-in closet and opens to the terrace. A second bedroom has a queen bed, private entrance, garden view and terrace access, and the third bedroom has a queen bed and an ocean view.Guests of Sunsara have direct access to Grace Bay Beach. From the villa, it’s a 3-minute drive to Turks & Caicos Golf and 3 miles to the grocery store, restaurants, shopping and nightlife in Grace Bay, as well as Princess Alexandra National Park. It’s about 6 miles to Turks & Caicos Island Tennis Club, 9 miles to the airport, 10 miles to Providenciales and 12 miles to Cheshire Hall. If you’d like to explore the island’s other beaches, Long Bay Beach is about 4 miles away and Coral Gardens Reef is 5 miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tucked into lush tropical grounds, Bluff House is a hidden gem right off one of the best beaches in Barbados. This gorgeous Caribbean vacation rental has private access to Sandy Lane Beach on what’s known as the island’s Platinum Coast, and a recent expansion and renovation means the villa can accommodate up to twelve guests in refined, open interiors that epitomize modern luxury. Leave the details to the property’s full staff and use the space for an intimate tropical wedding, family reunion or an unforgettable week with friends.Like a holiday at a premier resort, your stay at Bluff House includes the services of a cook, butler, housekeeper and caretaker. A gated entrance means you can let go of your cares as soon as you pull up the sweeping driveway and hear the burble of the fountain at the home’s entrance. You’ll want to spend most of your time on a lounge chair on the terrace by the pool or on one of the lounge chairs provided on the beach. After a swim, rinse off in the outdoor shower before heating up the barbecue and enjoying local specialties at the al-fresco dining area.Polished, cream-colored tile floors, elegant coral-stone walls and whitewashed beamed ceilings nod to traditional Caribbean architecture but have a contemporary, monochromatic twist. In the living and dining rooms, white upholstery on the sofas and dining chairs continues the fresh, minimalist look, while built-in coral-stone accents like consoles and moldings add texture. Throughout the house, an open layout and fold-away walls let in warm breezes and ocean views. And although your stay includes cook service, there is a fully equipped kitchen.Each of the six bedrooms at Bluff House has an en-suite bathroom. With a king bed, jetted tub and private balcony, the master suite is a retreat worthy of a honeymoon or other romantic getaway. There are two other bedrooms with king beds and three bedrooms with two twin beds each.Though many visitors come to Barbados just to be close to Sandy Lane Beach—down a short path—Bluff House isn’t far from other attractions on the island. Explore Holetown, Speightstown and Bridgetown, play a round at the Royal Westmoreland Golf Course or take a tour and taste a sample at the Mount Gay rum distillery. Hike through Welchman Hall Gully or dare to step inside Harrison’s Cave. If you’ve come for sun, sand and nothing but, it’s a short drive from the villa to Paynes Bay Beach, Colony Club Beach, and several other beautiful stretches. At the end of your stay, plan on a 24 km drive to Grantley Adams International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
